query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS posts (
  id VARCHAR(36) PRIMARY KEY,
  feed_id VARCHAR(36) NOT NULL,
  platform VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  platform_post_id VARCHAR(255),
  username VARCHAR(255),
  avatar_url VARCHAR(500),
  media_type VARCHAR(50),
  media_url VARCHAR(500),
  description LONGTEXT,
  likes INT DEFAULT 0,
  comments INT DEFAULT 0,
  created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  fetched_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  UNIQUE KEY unique_feed_post (feed_id, platform_post_id),
  INDEX idx_feed_id (feed_id),
  INDEX idx_created_at (created_at DESC)
);
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user SzLRAFmrJvZkxyu.root --database LixAXD5Cgjz5tzX5FSj8LL --execute CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS posts (
  id VARCHAR(36) PRIMARY KEY,
  feed_id VARCHAR(36) NOT NULL,
  platform VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  platform_post_id VARCHAR(255),
  username VARCHAR(255),
  avatar_url VARCHAR(500),
  media_type VARCHAR(50),
  media_url VARCHAR(500),
  description LONGTEXT,
  likes INT DEFAULT 0,
  comments INT DEFAULT 0,
  created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  fetched_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  UNIQUE KEY unique_feed_post (feed_id, platform_post_id),
  INDEX idx_feed_id (feed_id),
  INDEX idx_created_at (created_at DESC)
);
